title: Valentino Rossi’s VR46 Terra eMTB launches with 46 Numbered Bikes signed by the man himself
content:
What began as a fashion brand for fans of the 7 Time MotoGP World Champion, Valentino Rossi, latterly evolved into a bicycle brand with the launch of the VRFORTYSIX range of children’s BMX Bikes. Following his retirement at the 2021 MotoGP Season Finale just two weeks ago, Valentino is ready to take the brand further

The post Valentino Rossi’s VR46 Terra eMTB launches with 46 Numbered Bikes signed by the man himself appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
